name: Introduction to Art History
description: This course provides an introduction to the history of art, with an overview of major works and styles from the ancient through contemporary periods.

name: Ancient Art
description: This course surveys the art and architecture of the ancient world, from the Near East and Egypt to Greece and Rome.

name: Greek Art and Architecture
description: This course covers the art and architecture of ancient Greece from the Bronze Age to the Hellenistic period.

name: Roman Art and Architecture
description: This course covers the art and architecture of ancient Rome from the Etruscan period to the Late Antiquity.

name: Advanced Ancient Art
description: This course covers more in-depth topics related to ancient art and architecture, such as archaeological techniques, the social and political contexts of art, and theories of interpretation.
